long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heads-up display for the poker website pokernow.club. Be sure to read through the help page which can be accessed through the extension popup by clicking the extension icon. Make sure to refresh any PokerNow page you have open after beginning the trial.

To ensure privacy and to prevent data leaks no data ever leaves your computer.

Please email any bugs, comments, and suggestions to duckunreal@gmail.com.


Recent Changes:

11-22-2024
    - Bug Fixes

11-01-2024 (version 11.0):
    - Added support for PLO
    - Tweaked styling


This extension does not facilitate online gambling as pokernow.club does not accept real money, and so is not a gambling website.
